key.name: last-geometry
key.description: This setting describes the size and position of the window when it was last closed. The numbers are the X and Y coordinates of the top left corner of the window followed by the width and height of the window.

key.name: search-for-active-only
key.description: This setting indicates whether to search in all items in the current class, or only in 'active' items in the current class.

key.name: last-path
key.description: This field contains the last pathname used by this window. It will be used as the initial filename/pathname the next time this window is opened.

key.name: first-startup
key.description: If active, the new user window will be shown. Otherwise it will not be shown.

key.name: show-on-new-file
key.description: If active, the "New Hierarchy" window will be shown whenever the "New File" menu item is chosen. Otherwise it will not be shown.
